caption.p:
Antioxidant effects of polyherbal formulas in cisplatin-induced renal cell injury. The cisplatin renal cell injury model was treated with BJ, OR, PJ, and WR at 1 mg/ml for 3 days. The activities of superoxide dismutase (SOD (a, b) and catalase (c, d) were assessed. Values are represented as a percentage to the cisplatin nontreated group.
∗∗
p < 0.01 and
∗
p < 0.05 versus the cisplatin-treated vehicle control (Cis).
